name: CommerceTest
description: Unit tests for the Commerce class, focusing on various commerce-related functionalities.

test_cases.name: testDepartment
test_cases.description: Tests the department functionality of the Commerce class.

test_cases.name: testProductName
test_cases.description: Tests the product name functionality of the Commerce class.

test_cases.name: testPrice
test_cases.description: Tests the price functionality of the Commerce class.

test_cases.name: testPriceMinMax
test_cases.description: Tests the price functionality of the Commerce class with specified min and max values.

test_cases.name: testPromotionCode
test_cases.description: Tests the promotion code functionality of the Commerce class.

test_cases.name: testPromotionCodeDigits
test_cases.description: Tests the promotion code functionality of the Commerce class with specified number of digits.
